newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINVEST SELLS HOUSE TO MERITA.
newsitem.headline: FINVEST SELLS HOUSE TO MERITA.

text.p: Jaakko Poyry Oy, part of engineering and consulting group Finvest Oy, on Friday sold an office building to Merita Rahoitus Oy, part of banking group Merita Oy, for 150 million markka, Finvest said in a statement.
The deal would have a positive impact of about eight million markka on Finvest's operating result, it said, adding it would also raise the equity to assets ratio by about two percentage points.
Finvest and Merita Rahoitus also agreed on a long-term lease of the building.
